creator: kvasi@grad.com
text:
Apache 2.0.54 does not shutdown with "apache -k shutdown" when running as 
console (not service), the following error message is displayed:

[Thu Sep 08 15:02:30 2005] [error] (OS 2)The system cannot find the file 
specified.  : No installed service named "Apache2".

It seems to think I'm running the server as a service, which I'm not.
"apache -k shutdown" works for Apache 1.3.33.

This problem looks like bug 25484.  Since that bug seems to have a bit more
activity, you might consider marking this bug a dupe of that one.
creator: mike.j.burr@gmail.com
wrowe@apache.org
text:
Good suggestion, thanks Mike.  This is not a high priority (not a priority
whatsoever) as console mode really isn't ment for anything but light testing
and experimentation.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 25484 ***
